name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WFR Upwork Toolkit - Up your Upwork game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨 𝐭𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐬 on how to use the tools available on the extension homepage.

𝐑𝐢𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐝 𝐠𝐨𝐭 𝐚 𝐣𝐨𝐛 𝐨𝐧 𝐔𝐩𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤 𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐖𝐅𝐑 𝐓𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐤𝐢𝐭 : https://x.com/iamrichygold/status/1812123443082498074

𝐓𝐨𝐩 𝟓 𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐔𝐩𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤 𝐟𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐮𝐬𝐞 𝐖𝐅𝐑 𝐓𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐤𝐢𝐭 𝐭𝐨 𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐣𝐨𝐛𝐬

𝟏. Generate attention grabbing cover letter hook-up line.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐢𝐭 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐬: https://i.ibb.co/BNDPKgD/attention-grabbing-hookup-line-wfr-toolkit.jpg


𝟐. Get summary of all the client's pain points along with the most critical pain point to address in your cover letter opening line to grab the client's attention right away.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐢𝐭 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐬: https://i.ibb.co/5YMND31/writer-client-pain-point.jpg


𝟑. Automatically retrieve client names for cover letter personalization saving you valuable time and effort when writing cover letter.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐢𝐭 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐬: https://i.ibb.co/R4hsWFV/getting-client-name-wfr-gif.gif


𝟒. Save text templates to reuse (copy) while writing cover letters, eliminating repetitive typing and saving time.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐢𝐭 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐬: https://i.ibb.co/9Z9Dfvv/text-template-copy-tut-wfr-toolkit-gif.gif


𝟓. Job post directly above cover letter input box ensuring you don't have to scroll upwards to reference information from the job post again.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐢𝐭 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐬: https://i.ibb.co/5nVg0wq/job-post-abover-cover-letter-gif-wfr-toolkit.gif

𝐖𝐡𝐲 𝐖𝐅𝐑 𝐓𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐤𝐢𝐭? 

WFR Toolkit does not affect your Upwork account in any way, this tool was built by a Top rated freelancer on Upwork, his Top rated account was used in building, testing and debugging of this toolkit for months and he never had any issues. It's 100% safe to use.

Install WFR Toolkit now and experience the game-changing power of time-saving innovation. Your success is just a click away!
